summary: "2001: A Space Odyssey" is a 1968 science fiction film by Stanley Kubrick about a trip to Jupiter to investigate an alien object. It stars Keir Dullea and features HAL 9000, a supercomputer. The film is known for its realistic space travel, innovative special effects, and complex themes like human evolution and AI. It has a minimal script and uses classical music. Critics had mixed reactions, but it's now considered one of the best films ever made. It won an Academy Award for its visual effects.
title: 2001 A Space Odyssey
